resources.string: Hi, I\'m Danilo, a young software engineer from Switzerland. I created this app to simplify the life of people that maintain an Instagram hub. You can find me on Twitter (@dbrgn), Instagram (@dbrgn) and on the Internet (www.dbrgn.ch).
This app is released under the GPLv3 license. Code and full license text can be found at https://github.com/dbrgn/simplerepost/.
